translation.en: Alpha Base, still no sign of the creature.
translation.zh: A基地 还是没有生物迹象

translation.en: Captain Lightspeed, our trackers show that Cruncher is right behind you.
translation.zh:
光速队长 我们的追踪器显示
利牙怪就在你身后

translation.en: Negative Alpha Base. Believe me, if it was right on top of me, I'd know.
translation.zh:
没有看到 A基地
相信我 如果就在我头上 我会知道

translation.en: It's right on top of me!
translation.zh: 就在我头上！

translation.en: -I prepared you a light lunch. -[roars]
translation.zh: 我为你准备了一份清淡的午餐

translation.en: Here you go, chubby.
translation.zh: 来了 胖子

translation.en: Is that a muffin-top I see?
translation.zh: 我是不是看到腰间赘肉了？

translation.en: Ugh! Forget weapons. I should've brought some breath mints.
translation.zh: 武器就不谈了 我应该带点口香糖

translation.en: But you can start flossing with this.
translation.zh: 不过你可以用这个来剔牙

translation.en: Or not.
translation.zh: 要不算了

translation.en: Time to wake up the babies.
translation.zh: 该唤醒宝宝们了

translation.en: [Reid] Wake up the babies?
translation.zh: 唤醒宝宝们？

translation.en: Oh, cool.
translation.zh: 噢 好吧

translation.en: Whenever they refer to weapons as babies, you know it's gonna be sick.
translation.zh:
把武器形容成宝宝时
你就知道一定会很赞了

translation.en: [Buckethead laughs] Dude, are you kidding me?
translation.zh: 兄弟 你开玩笑吗？

translation.en: You're at the second to last level of Planet Master.
translation.zh: 你打到了《星球大师》的最后一级

translation.en: Nobody's ever made it this far.
translation.zh: 从没有人打到过这一级

translation.en: That's why my screen name is Fearless and not Buckethead.
translation.zh:
所以说我的账户名是“无畏”
而不是“桶头”

translation.en: You've gotta come up with a better name than Buckethead.
translation.zh: 可不能取“桶头”这么烂的名字

translation.en: [Zoinker] Why? His head is an empty bucket.
translation.zh: 为什么？我的头就是个空水桶

translation.en: -[Buckethead] Shut your face. -[Wonderpunk] Watch the tail.
translation.zh:
-你闭嘴吧
-小心后面

translation.en: -Watch it. -[Zoinker] The spikes are poisonous.
translation.zh:
-小心
-刺有毒

translation.en: [Buckethead] Let the man concentrate.
translation.zh: 让他集中注意

translation.en: Yeah, you're talking to the guy who jumped a rocket cycle over Apocalypse Canyon.
translation.zh:
没错 这人在天启峡谷上
像火箭一样跳跃

translation.en: Okay, let's wake up the babies. What could they be?
translation.zh:
好的 咱们唤醒宝宝们
会是什么呢？

translation.en: Sonic blast cannons? Plasma laser disintegrators?
translation.zh: 声波大炮？等离子激光粉碎器？

translation.en: Molten molecule melters?
translation.zh: 热熔疯子熔化器？

translation.en: Welcome to Bring Your Children to Work Day.
translation.zh: 欢迎参加“带孩子上班日”

translation.en: -Real... babies? -[Zoinker] This has gotta be a joke.
translation.zh:
-真的宝宝？
-一定是开玩笑

translation.en: [Wonderpunk] What do these babies have, superpower puke?
translation.zh: 宝宝有什么？超能呕吐？

translation.en: I climbed to the top of the toughest video game ever made
translation.zh: 我爬到游戏的最高等级

translation.en: just to change diapers and sing lullabies?
translation.zh: 就为了换尿布和唱摇篮曲？

translation.en: All right, kids, let's see if you remember what Daddy's been teaching you
translation.zh:
好吧 孩子们 看看你们还记不记得
爸爸在午睡时间后教你们的东西

translation.en: after nap time.
translation.zh:
看看你们还记不记得
爸爸在午睡时间后教你们的东西

translation.en: -Little bigger than a salad fork, buddy. -Ah!
translation.zh: 要比沙拉叉稍微大一点 朋友

translation.en: Ah, you'll get there.
translation.zh: 总会学会的

translation.en: Trust me, kids, when you get bigger, so will your powers.
translation.zh:
相信我 孩子
当你长大时 你的力量也会增大

translation.en: Watch Daddy.
translation.zh: 看爸爸的

translation.en: [Buckethead] Can we blow something up? These babies are boring.
translation.zh: 能炸点东西吗？这些宝宝太无聊了

translation.en: They'll cost me the mission. Isn't there a space stroller I can put these kids in?
translation.zh:
他们会让我完不成任务
有太空婴儿车可以让他们坐吗？

translation.en: [Buckethead] You hit that final level. You're a gamer god!
translation.zh: 兄弟 你到了最后一级 你是游戏之神！

translation.en: Call me Fearless.
translation.zh: 叫我“无畏”

translation.en: Nothing can stop me now.
translation.zh: 现在谁都挡不住我

translation.en: Nothing!
translation.zh: 没门儿！

translation.en: Oh, except her.
translation.zh: 噢 她除外

translation.en: -Hey, Mom. -[Mom] Hi, sweetie.Just checkin' in.
translation.zh:
-你好 妈妈
-亲爱的 就看看你怎么样

translation.en: I wanna make sure you're not playing video games while we're gone all weekend.
translation.zh:
我们周末都不在家
你可不能玩电子游戏

translation.en: -That's ridiculous. -[Mom] And I'm reminding you
translation.zh:
-怎么可能呢？
-我提醒你

translation.en: that your science project is due in two weeks.
translation.zh: 你的科学项目两周后就要交了

translation.en: -Your partner still coming over tonight? -Yup.
translation.zh:
-你的拍档今晚还要来吗？
-要

translation.en: -This guy's a monster. -[Mom] What?
translation.zh:
-这人太牛了
-什么？

translation.en: Uh, it's a monster homework assignment, and I'm on it.
translation.zh: 我在做关于牛的作业

translation.en: [Dad] Make sure he fills out the college application!
translation.zh: 一定要填好大学申请表

translation.en: I will, I just have to, uh, finish, a couple more things.
translation.zh: 会填好的 我先做完几件事

translation.en: -[Dad] Like another video game! -I'm-- That's not what I'm doing at all.
translation.zh: 是再玩一局游戏吧 没有 我不在玩游戏

translation.en: [Mom] We should go. Dad's giving the keynote in a few minutes,
translation.zh:
我们要挂了
爸爸过几分钟要作主题演讲了

translation.en: and you know how he gets gassy
translation.zh: 你知道的 他一紧张就会说个不停

translation.en: -when he gets nervous. -Okay, TMI.
translation.zh: 好的 点到为止

translation.en: -Enjoy the weekend. Don't worry about me. -[Mom] Okay. Bye, sweetie.
translation.zh:
-享受周末 别担心我
-好的 再见 亲爱的

translation.en: -Honey? -Yup, me too, bye.
translation.zh:
-亲爱的？
-嗯？我也是 再见

translation.en: Okay, let's finish this beast.
translation.zh: 好 咱们解决这头野兽

translation.en: -Death by geyser? It's a rough way to go. -[giggle]
translation.zh: 被间歇泉杀死？好惨的死法

translation.en: [Reid] And cue the music, that sweet sound.
translation.zh: 音乐响起 甜美的声音

translation.en: Ooh, there we go. I'm victor.
translation.zh: 噢 这就对了 我是胜利者

translation.en: [Arcannis] Captain Lightspeed. In my way once again.
translation.zh: 光速队长 你又挡我的路了

translation.en: Dr. Arcannis.
translation.zh: 阿坎尼斯博士

translation.en: Aha. Arcannis.
translation.zh: 阿坎尼斯

translation.en: -This is the guy I wanna take out. -[Buckethead] Shoot him, man. He looks like asparagus.
translation.zh:
-我要干掉这家伙
-打他 兄弟 他看起来像芦笋

translation.en: So pathetic, using your children to fight your battles for you.
translation.zh: 太可悲了 用自己的孩子作战

translation.en: They'll probably grow up just like their father.
translation.zh: 他们长大后一定会像父亲一样

translation.en: I bet you wonder what that's like.
translation.zh: 到时候可有你受的

translation.en: This is far from over, Captain.
translation.zh: 这远没有结束 队长

translation.en: I will never stop until I obliterate you from the universe
translation.zh: 在我将你从宇宙中消灭 并征服前进路上的每个星球之前

translation.en: and conquer every planet in my path.
translation.zh: 并征服前进路上的每个星球之前 我永远不会停止

translation.en: You can make all the deadly threats you want.
translation.zh: 你怎么说都行

translation.en: But you don't have superpowers, and you never will.
translation.zh: 但是你没有超能力 永远都不会有

translation.en: [grunts] This isn't over, Lightspeed.
translation.zh: 这事没完 光速

translation.en: Wherever heroes are needed, we'll be there.
translation.zh: 哪里需要英雄 我们就去哪里

translation.en: I'll have all your powers and more
translation.zh: 等我到了下一个等级

translation.en: when I take it to the next level.
translation.zh:
我就会拥有你的全部力量
甚至还会更多

translation.en: [Buckethead] You're about to get to the final level.
translation.zh: 兄弟 你就要进入最后一级了

translation.en: -[Zoinker] That's crazy! -[Wonderpunk] Insane!
translation.zh:
-兄弟 太棒了
-赞

translation.en: This is big. Fearless is about to become a household name.
translation.zh: 太好了 “无畏”这个名字将家喻户晓

translation.en: But first, I gotta get rid of these babies.
translation.zh: 但是我得先甩掉这几个宝宝

translation.en: They're just gonna slow me down.
translation.zh: 他们会拖慢我

translation.en: Let me see if I-- Oh, here we go, Daycare.
translation.zh: 看看有没有… 噢 这里有托儿所 好的

translation.en: Okay. Looks like I can drop them off while they grow their powers.
translation.zh: 噢 这里有托儿所 好的 可以放在这里 让他们的能力成长

translation.en: [Zoinker] And fill their diapers.
translation.zh: 同时拉满尿布

translation.en: [Reid] Let a babysitter change 'em, not me.
translation.zh: 让保姆换尿布 不用我来

translation.en: [Captain] Their powers are weak right now.
translation.zh: 他们现在的力量很弱

translation.en: I'm hoping they can rest up and grow them here.
translation.zh: 希望他们能在这里休息、成长

translation.en: I hate to let them out of my sight,
translation.zh: 我不喜欢让他们离开视线

translation.en: but I have a debriefing with the Galactic Council.
translation.zh: 但我要向银河委员会作报告

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Their mother's at a weekend seminar:
translation.zh: 妈妈去参加周末研讨会了

translation.en: "The Dos and Don'ts of Battling Black Hole Scorpions."
translation.zh: “与黑洞蝎子作战的要点”

translation.en: -You got all of their snacks, right? -Yes, Captain.
translation.zh:
-零食都有 是吧？
-是的 队长

translation.en: In case of emergency, you can reach me using this.
translation.zh: 如有急事 可以用这个联系我

translation.en: -Got it. -My interplanetary communicator.
translation.zh:
-好的
-我的星际通信器

translation.en: -I've seen one before. -Oh.
translation.zh: 我见过

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -There you... go. -You can let go.
translation.zh:
-去吧
-你松手吧

translation.en: Daddy loves you, baby.
translation.zh: 爸爸爱你 宝宝

translation.en: Just remember that I'll always-- Okay, she's gone.
translation.zh: 记住 我永远… 好吧 她走了

translation.en: [Wonderpunk] How do we get from babysitting to winning this game?
translation.zh: 怎么才能从做保姆到赢比赛呢？

translation.en: [Zoinker] Let's get back to blasting stuff.
translation.zh:
-咱们继续炸东西
-对 建议跳过剧情片段

translation.en: [Buckethead] I say skip all the cut scenes and get to the action.
translation.zh:
-咱们继续炸东西
-对 建议跳过剧情片段 直接行动

translation.en: On second thought, I don't wanna miss anything.
translation.zh: 再想想 我不想错过任何内容

translation.en: One of these babiesmight lay an Easter egg. I don't know.
translation.zh:
可能有个宝宝会下一个彩蛋 -不知道
-有道理 兄弟

translation.en: [Buckethead] Good point. Smart move. That's why you're number one and I'm--
translation.zh:
-不知道
-有道理 兄弟 聪明 难怪你排第一 而我排…

translation.en: -Two thousandth and ninety-eighth. -[Buckethead] Ouch. That hurt.
translation.zh:
-排2098名
-哎 好伤人

translation.en: As their powers increase, we make sure each baby gets a palladium pacifier.
translation.zh:
由于他们的能力在增长
给每个宝宝一个钯奶嘴

translation.en: This neutralizes their power, so they don't use them, accidentally.
translation.zh:
这能抵消他们的能力
以免意外使用

translation.en: Of course, yes, I remember.
translation.zh: 当然了 对 我记得

translation.en: All of our playrooms are reinforced steel, laser-repellent, flame-retardant,
translation.zh:
我们的游戏房都是钢筋制成
防激光 防火

translation.en: earthquake-proof, radiation-proof.
translation.zh: 防地震 防辐射

translation.en: Oh, and tinkle-proof.
translation.zh: 噢 而且防尿

translation.en: -Fleech. -Ah!
translation.zh: 跳蛭

translation.en: Focus.
translation.zh: 全神贯注

translation.en: It's time to steal some babies.
translation.zh: 偷宝宝时间到

translation.en: -[making gun noises] -And no, you may not eat them.
translation.zh: 而且你不准吃他们

translation.en: [Arcannis] Come on.
translation.zh: 来

translation.en: Here.
translation.zh: 这里

translation.en: Titus.
translation.zh: 泰特斯

translation.en: I can only hope you're as strong as your father.
translation.zh: 希望你和你父亲一样强壮

translation.en: Xander.
translation.zh: 赞德

translation.en: Creates anything he imagines.
translation.zh: 想象什么 就能创造什么

translation.en: Just imagine.
translation.zh: 想象一下

translation.en: Kira. The girl child of Captain Lightspeed.
translation.zh: 基拉 光速队长的女儿

translation.en: -You may be the most powerful of all. -Mmm.
translation.zh: 你或许是最强大的

translation.en: -[toy squeaking] -You fool!
translation.zh: 你个白痴

translation.en: I love you. You're my best fri--
translation.zh: 我爱你 你是我最好的朋…

translation.en: He just stole the babies. Wow, this is heating up.
translation.zh:
他刚把宝宝们偷走了
哇 开始紧张了

translation.en: -[Buckethead] Watch out for traps. -I gotta wrap this up soon.
translation.zh: 小心陷阱 我得快点结束 梅兰妮要过来

translation.en: Melanie is coming over. We gotta work on our science project.
translation.zh: 我得快点结束 梅兰妮要过来 我们要做科学项目

translation.en: -[Zoinker] Melanie. She's fire. -[Buckethead] You're lucky.
translation.zh: 噢 梅兰妮很漂亮 你真走运 她也非常聪明

translation.en: She's really smart too. I got Lunch Room Louise. Ugh!
translation.zh: 你真走运 她也非常聪明 我却遇不到

translation.en: With any luck Melanie will do the project for me.
translation.zh:
运气好的话
梅兰妮会帮我把全部作业都做了

translation.en: -[Zoinker] Sorry, I'm out. Dinner time. -[Wonderpunk] Me too.
translation.zh:
-抱歉 我走了 吃饭
-我也是 有好事给我发信息

translation.en: -Text me when it gets good. -[Reid] Later guys.
translation.zh:
-抱歉 我走了 吃饭
-我也是 有好事给我发信息 好的 回头见

translation.en: [Buckethead] I'm with you. No way I'm missing this.
translation.zh: 我跟你一起 兄弟 我可绝不能错过这个

translation.en: Finally. Back to TheObsidian.
translation.zh: 终于来了 回到黑曜石号

translation.en: Yes. This is gonna be tight!
translation.zh: 好！要紧张了！

translation.en: -Fleech. -[yells]
translation.zh: 跳蛭

translation.en: Hook up the subjects to The Extrapolator.
translation.zh: 把物件挂上外推器

translation.en: [gasps] This chair's all sweaty and... moist.
translation.zh: 椅子上好多汗 好潮湿！

translation.en: Captain Lightspeed.You look distraught.
translation.zh:
光速队长 -你似乎心烦意乱
-阿坎尼斯 你无耻！

translation.en: Arcannis. You filth!
translation.zh:
-你似乎心烦意乱
-阿坎尼斯 你无耻！

translation.en: You took my children! If you touch one hair--
translation.zh:
抓走了我的孩子！
如果你敢动他们一根汗毛…

translation.en: Please. Spare me your needless declarations and warnings.
translation.zh: 拜托 没必要的豪言和警告就别说了

translation.en: I just called to thank you for giving me the idea, Captain.
translation.zh:
我打过来
是为了感谢你给我提供点子 队长

translation.en: "You don't have superpowers, and you never will."
translation.zh: “你没有超能力 永远都不会有”

translation.en: But what if I found a way?
translation.zh: 但是 要是我找到了办法呢？

translation.en: You see, with my new Extrapolator, I have.
translation.zh: 有了我的新外推器 我有办法了

translation.en: And who better to give them to me than your defenseless offspring?
translation.zh: 还有谁比你毫无防备的后代更好呢？

translation.en: You've always been jealous of my powers. Daddy issues?
translation.zh: 你一向妒忌我的超能力 因为你爸？

translation.en: -What? -[Captain] Your dad took over 20
translation.zh:
-什么？
-你爸被我关起来之前

translation.en: or 30planetsbefore I locked him up.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-你爸被我关起来之前  拿下了二三十个星球

translation.en: And you? Hang on, let me do the math. Zero.
translation.zh: 你呢？等等 我算一下 一个也没有

translation.en: I'll conquer all of my father's planets and more.
translation.zh:
我会征服我父亲的全部星球
还要征服更多

translation.en: Somebody's a little obsessed.
translation.zh: 有人有点太执迷不悟

translation.en: Obsessed? Obsessed? How dare you!
translation.zh: 执迷不悟？ 执迷不悟？你好大的胆子！

translation.en: You sit on your golden throne high above the rest of us.
translation.zh: 你高高在上 坐在金色王座上

translation.en: I wasn't born with a silver spoon in my mouth. Huh.
translation.zh: 我没有含着银汤匙出生

translation.en: But now I will make my own spoon.
translation.zh: 但我会做我自己的银汤匙

translation.en: A spoon that will crush you all.
translation.zh: 能够把你们都碾碎的汤匙

translation.en: -That's a pretty big spoon. -It's not a real spoon, Lightspeed!
translation.zh:
-好大的汤匙
-不是说真的汤匙 光速！

translation.en: Oh, but how the tide has turned.
translation.zh: 噢 但是此一时彼一时

translation.en: I will harvest your babies' powers,
translation.zh: 我会收割你宝宝们的超能力

translation.en: and then nothing can stop me from conquering any planet I wish.
translation.zh:
然后我想征服任何星球
都没人能够阻挡了

translation.en: My master plan is in motion,
translation.zh: 我的妙计已经展开

translation.en: every piece is in place
translation.zh: 万事俱备

translation.en: as your angelic children, peacefully slumbering,
translation.zh: 你天使般的孩子们平静地睡着

translation.en: unaware of their contribution to my unstoppable, diabolical powers.
translation.zh: 对我不可阻挡的恶魔超能力贡献巨大 自己却毫不知情

translation.en: I have anticipated even the slightest error,
translation.zh: 我预计到了最细小的错误

translation.en: every detail, every precise calculation in my favor.
translation.zh:
每一个细节 每一个精确的计算
都对我有利

translation.en: I'd love to exchange more deadly threats, but I must get the little ones to my lair.
translation.zh: 我也想再多说一些致命的威胁 不过我得把小家伙们带入巢穴了

translation.en: -So much power to consume, so little time. -No--!
translation.zh:
-时间很少 要消化的超能力很多
-不行！

translation.en: -[robot] Welcome aboard. -[cooing]
translation.zh: 欢迎

translation.en: [robot] Launch code accepted.
translation.zh: 发射代码已接受

translation.en: Please hang on.
translation.zh: 请稍等

translation.en: Uh-oh. Warning.
translation.zh: “警告”

translation.en: Final level.
translation.zh: “最终级”

translation.en: Do you accept the consequences? That's the weirdest thing I've ever seen.
translation.zh:
“你是否接受后果？” -这是我见过的最奇怪的东西
-好古怪

translation.en: [Buckethead] That's freaky.
translation.zh:
-这是我见过的最奇怪的东西
-好古怪

translation.en: Ah, it's all hype.
translation.zh: 都是夸张 写这些只是为了吓我

translation.en: They just put that in there to scare me. Nice try.
translation.zh: 都是夸张 写这些只是为了吓我 差点被你唬住了

translation.en: Time for Fearless to become a legend.
translation.zh: 无畏成为传奇的时间到了

translation.en: Cool. There's nothing like flying through a wormhole.
translation.zh: 好 飞过虫洞最厉害了

translation.en: [Buckethead snickers] Worm hole.
translation.zh: 虫洞

translation.en: This calls for more caffeine.
translation.zh: 要多来点咖啡因

translation.en: [Buckethead] Hear that. I'm gonna go eat a pie.
translation.zh: 听到了 我去吃一个馅饼

translation.en: -Okay. -[door bell rings]
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Oh, not now.
translation.zh: 噢 不是现在来吧

translation.en: -Hang on. -[whirling]
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: Okay, you don't have to knock so hard. I heard the bell the first time.
translation.zh: 好了 不用敲这么大声 我听到门铃声了 真是的

translation.en: Jeez Louise.
translation.zh: 我听到门铃声了 真是的

translation.en: -General Blazerhatch. -[General] I'll take a coffee, black.
translation.zh:
-布莱泽海奇将军
-我来一杯清咖啡

translation.en: What's the skinny on our UFO?
translation.zh: 不明飞行物怎么样了？

translation.en: The object came from outside Earth's atmosphere at 1900 hours.
translation.zh: 物体于19点从地球大气外进入

translation.en: We're picking up vital signs from inside the object.
translation.zh: 我们正在侦测物体内部的关键信号

translation.en: Sweet God in heaven.
translation.zh: 神啊！

translation.en: I guess I'll take that coffee... to go.
translation.zh: 咖啡外带吧

translation.en: No! No!
translation.zh: 不是吧！

translation.en: Imbecile.
translation.zh: 低能

translation.en: You pile of worthless skin cells.
translation.zh: 你这个窝囊废

translation.en: You only had to get them into The Extrapolator.
translation.zh: 你只要把他们送进外推器就行

translation.en: Let's go hunting.
translation.zh: 捕猎开始了

translation.en: Melanie. Hey. Hi. Uh, come on in.
translation.zh: 梅兰妮 你好 进来吧

translation.en: I'm not interrupting anything, am I?
translation.zh: 没打扰吧？

translation.en: No. I was just saving the world.
translation.zh: 没有 我刚才正在拯救世界

translation.en: You know, uh, Planet Master?
translation.zh: 知道《星球大师》吗？

translation.en: [scoffs] I don't really play video games.
translation.zh: 我不太玩电子游戏

translation.en: Yeah, I'm kind of a big deal online. Fearless, that's my gamer tag.
translation.zh:
嗯 我在网上还挺厉害呢
我在游戏的名字叫无畏

translation.en: Hmm. Yeah. I spend my time studying. Really focused on graduating right now.
translation.zh: 嗯 我把时间花在学习上 现在全部精力扑在毕业上

translation.en: Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah. Me too.
translation.zh: 噢 对 我也是

translation.en: I figure if we work on this 3 hours a night for 2 nights,
translation.zh:
我想着如果咱们用两天晚上
每晚花三个小时

translation.en: we'll have this project done this weekend.
translation.zh: 这个周末就能把项目做完

translation.en: Or 2 hours a night over the next week. I have both schedules here.
translation.zh: 或者接下去一周每晚两小时 两种时间安排都规划好了

translation.en: Wh-- Whoa, that's a lot of scheduling. Did you schedule any bathroom breaks?
translation.zh:
哇 安排了好多
安排上厕所时间了吗？

translation.en: Of course. Twice an hour.
translation.zh: 当然 每小时两次

translation.en: This is 30 percent of our grade, Reid. I'm taking it seriously.
translation.zh: 这占了我们分数的30% 里德 我在严肃对待 咱们开始想点子吧

translation.en: So let's get to brainstorming.
translation.zh: 我在严肃对待 咱们开始想点子吧

translation.en: -I'm sure you have some ideas. -Sure.
translation.zh:
-你一定会有一些点子
-没错

translation.en: Like...
translation.zh: 比如…

translation.en: There's solar power.
translation.zh: 有太阳能

translation.en: -Uh, the electricity of light. -[snaps fingers]
translation.zh: 光电

translation.en: Uhhh. Arcannis effect on lightspeed.
translation.zh: 光速的阿坎尼斯效应

translation.en: Space travel!
translation.zh: 太空旅行

translation.en: I was thinking advanced geometric telecommunications.
translation.zh: 我在想高等几何电信

translation.en: Or rocket boots.
translation.zh: 或者火箭靴

translation.en: You wanna make rocket boots?
translation.zh: 你想做火箭靴？

translation.en: -These are just rough ideas. Oh. -[thudding]
translation.zh: 只不过是大概想想

translation.en: See, this-- this is why I'm not a fan of partner projects.
translation.zh: 所以我不太喜欢合作项目

translation.en: I'm usually the only one who does any work.
translation.zh: 通常都是我在做

translation.en: This is gonna be a long night. Might as well take our first break now.
translation.zh:
今晚一定会忙到很晚
现在先进行第一次休息吧

translation.en: -Where's your bathroom? -First door down the hall.
translation.zh:
-洗手间在哪里？
-走到底第一扇门进去

translation.en: Can you at least crack a notebook while I'm gone?
translation.zh:
我不在时
你至少拿一本笔记本出来吧

translation.en: Write down one idea.
translation.zh: 写下一个想法

translation.en: I guess she's not gonna do the whole project for me.
translation.zh: 她大概不会帮我把项目都做完

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么？

translation.en: That was weird.
translation.zh: 好奇怪

translation.en: Baby. Here from the game. [chuckles] Okay…
translation.zh: 宝宝 游戏里来的 好的

translation.en: Uh, well, this can't be actually happening.
translation.zh: 呃 不可能啊

translation.en: -Another one? Did they all come here? -[cooing]
translation.zh: 又来一个？他们都到这里来了？

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Bu-- Just stay.
translation.zh: 哎 别动

translation.en: -Ahh. -Whoa. Oh, baby.
translation.zh: 噢 宝宝

translation.en: Whoa. Don't eat...
translation.zh: 噢 不要吃…

translation.en: No, no, no, no. You can't be here. This doesn't make sense.
translation.zh: 不行 你不能在这里 这样不行

translation.en: Just put you back in the game. Uh. Come on. Come on!
translation.zh: 就把你放回游戏里 拜托

translation.en: What is this? I found a baby in here.
translation.zh: 怎么回事 我在这里发现了一个宝宝

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 啊？

translation.en: There are more? When did you start babysitting?
translation.zh:
还不止一个？
你什么时候开始做保姆了？

translation.en: They're not really-- Here's the thing.
translation.zh: 他们不是真的… 其实是这样的

translation.en: These babies are from Planet Master.
translation.zh: 这些宝宝是《星球大师》里来的

translation.en: Stop with the jokes, Reid. Whose kids are these?
translation.zh: 别开玩笑了 里德 是谁的宝宝？

translation.en: It might be hard to believe, but these are actually the children of… Captain Lightspeed.
translation.zh:
可能难以置信
不过他们是光速队长的孩子

translation.en: And he's in the video game. [chuckles] They have super powers.
translation.zh: 电子游戏里的 他们有超能力

translation.en: If you're trying to bail on the science project, just say so.
translation.zh: 如果你不想做科学项目 直说就行

translation.en: I will figure this out.
translation.zh: 听我说 我会想出办法

translation.en: Until I do, we can still work on the project.
translation.zh: 在此之前 我们还是可以做项目

translation.en: -I just have to keep them busy. -And how are you gonna do that?
translation.zh:
-我只要让他们别闲着就行
-你打算怎么做呢？

translation.en: Okay, toys. You want toys. Here you go.
translation.zh: 好的 玩具 你们要玩具 给你们

translation.en: -This is a shoe, and here is a ball. -[coos]
translation.zh: 这是一只鞋 这是一个球

translation.en: -Uh, and this is a mouse. -[coos]
translation.zh: 这是一个鼠标

translation.en: -[cries] -Oh, what is-- What's happening?
translation.zh: 怎么了？别发出这种声音

translation.en: What's this? Don't make that sound. Noooo, no, no, no.
translation.zh: 怎么了？别发出这种声音 别这样

translation.en: Oh, here, these usually work.
translation.zh: 噢 用这个 通常管用

translation.en: I'm gonna go find them something more appropriate to play with.
translation.zh: 我去找点更合适的东西给他们玩

translation.en: Fine, great.
translation.zh: 好的 很好

translation.en: There's gotta be a cheat code to delete you, or...
translation.zh: 一定有作弊码可以删除你们 或者…

translation.en: -[coos] -Where's the third one?
translation.zh: 还有一个宝宝呢？

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no, no, where'd he go? Okay.
translation.zh: 不是吧 他上哪儿去了？好的

translation.en: Here. Uh, play with this.
translation.zh: 这个给你 玩吧

translation.en: -[coos] -Yup, that's a ball.
translation.zh: 对 是一个球

translation.en: -[whines] -Yeah, you got it.
translation.zh: 对 没错

translation.en: -[cries] -Look, I get it, you wanna-- Oh!
translation.zh: 我明白 你要…

translation.en: And now your powers are getting stronger? Please, not here.
translation.zh:
现在你们的能力在变强？
拜托 别在这里弄啊

translation.en: Oh. Hey, not the bookshelf. Get down.
translation.zh: 哎 别到书架上去 下来

translation.en: You do not throw a book at me, okay? That's not a toy.
translation.zh: 你 不准朝我扔书 好吗？书不是玩具

translation.en: And you are a bad baby.
translation.zh: 你是个坏宝宝

translation.en: Oh! No, no!
translation.zh: 不是吧！

translation.en: What happened? Anybody hurt?
translation.zh: 怎么回事啊？有谁受伤吗？

translation.en: Just you. You gotta be more careful around little kids.
translation.zh:
噢 就你受伤了
有小孩在 你得更小心一点

translation.en: -They're not just kids-- -You figure out what to do
translation.zh:
-不是一般的孩子…
-你想想这些孩子怎么办

translation.en: with these babies. I'm gonna go work in the kitchen and get something done.
translation.zh: 我去厨房做事

translation.en: Laugh it up, you little space gremlins.
translation.zh: 笑吧 你们这些太空小魔怪

translation.en: If I got you here, I'm gonna figure out how to send you back.
translation.zh:
我把你们带来
也会想办法把你们送回去

translation.en: -[screams] -Oh, shrimp. Okay...
translation.zh: 哎哟 好吧

translation.en: Everything all right?
translation.zh: 没事吧？

translation.en: -Um. Hey, kid, why don't you just-- -[laughs]
translation.zh: 哎 孩子 要不你…

translation.en: What are you trying to do in here? Teach them professional wrestling?
translation.zh: 你干嘛？教职业摔跤吗？

translation.en: No, I've been trying to tell you,
translation.zh: 不是 我是想告诉你

translation.en: these babies are from Planet Master, the video game.
translation.zh: 这些宝宝来自电子游戏《星球大师》

translation.en: I played the final level and somehow broke the laws of time and space
translation.zh:
我打到了最后一级
不知怎么的打破了时空法则

translation.en: and brought them... here.
translation.zh: 就把他们带到了这里

translation.en: Reid, I don't have time for this.
translation.zh: 里德 我没时间搞这些

translation.en: I came here to work.
translation.zh: 我是来做项目的

translation.en: -Can you just focus on-- -Put down the couch!
translation.zh:
-你能不能把注意力放在…
-把沙发放下！

translation.en: Put down what?
translation.zh: 把什么放下？

translation.en: -Fine. You wanna play games? -[giggles]
translation.zh: 好吧 你想玩游戏？

translation.en: You can keep babysitting or whatever this is.
translation.zh: 你想做保姆什么的随便你

translation.en: I'm gonna ask Mrs. Wilson to assign me another partner.
translation.zh:
我会让威尔森老师
给我另外安排一个拍档

translation.en: -This isn't my fault. It's this game. -You really need to grow up.
translation.zh:
-这不怪我 是游戏的问题
-你真的得长大才行

translation.en: I'm not gonna let some slacker like you crash my whole GPA.
translation.zh:
我不会让你这样的懒虫
把我的绩点拉低

translation.en: Go back to your video games.
translation.zh: 继续玩电子游戏吧

translation.en: You seem to be more successful there than you are in real life.
translation.zh:
你在游戏里
似乎比在真实生活中更成功

translation.en: Who threw the shoe?
translation.zh: 谁扔的鞋？

translation.en: Well, congratulations.
translation.zh: 祝贺

translation.en: You ruined her night. You ruined my night.
translation.zh: 你们毁了她的夜晚 也毁了我的夜晚

translation.en: You ruined half my house. Well done.
translation.zh: 把我家都毁了一半 做得好

translation.en: Oh yeah, give yourself a hand. [claps]
translation.zh: 噢 对 为自己拍手吧

translation.en: Video game babies.
translation.zh: 电子游戏宝宝

translation.en: [Mission Control] Houston, we've lost satellite 1187. Are you seeing…
translation.zh:
休斯顿 1187号卫星失踪了
有没有看到…

translation.en: [Houston Control] Mission Control, we are losing your signal, are you...
translation.zh:
任务控制中心
我们正在失去你们的信号 是否…

translation.en: The second object just entered the atmosphere. We're tracking it now.
translation.zh:
第二个物体刚进入大气层
我们正在追踪

translation.en: Get me the Pentagon. I want the Air Force ready to shake a big stick at this.
translation.zh:
给我接五角大楼
我要空军准备全面出击

translation.en: Someone hand me an important file.
translation.zh: 重要文件给我

translation.en: -Put this on a clipboard. -Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh:
-放到笔记板上
-是 长官

translation.en: I want a clipboard handed to me every 2 minutes.
translation.zh: 每两分钟给我递一次笔记板

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh: 是 长官

translation.en: I want this retyped in bold Courier font, all caps.
translation.zh: 用粗体Courier字体重打 全部大写

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh: 是 长官

translation.en: When this chopper lands and my black Cadillacs hit the ground,
translation.zh: 直升机降落 我的士兵到达的时候

translation.en: I want a base camp waiting, gentlemen.
translation.zh: 营地要已准备就绪 先生们

translation.en: No bug-eyed moon man is gonna probe the U.S. of A. on my watch.
translation.zh:
在我的领导下
绝不允许暴言月球人刺探美国

translation.en: [all] Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh: 是 长官

translation.en: Through a wormhole? From a video game?
translation.zh: 穿过虫洞来的？从电子游戏里来？

translation.en: I don't know how to explain it, but we have to send these babies back
translation.zh: 我不知道怎么解释 但是咱们得把宝宝们送回游戏里

translation.en: -into the game. -We? There is no "we."
translation.zh: 咱们？没有“咱们”

translation.en: These kids would break Mary Poppins in half.
translation.zh: 这些孩子会把仙女玛丽切成两半

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 哎

translation.en: You need to call animal control or the police.
translation.zh:
你得打电话给动物管制局
或者报警

translation.en: No cops. Last thing I need is that phone call to my parents.
translation.zh:
不能报警
决不能让警察打电话给我父母

translation.en: I'm outta here. You're on your own. Are you crazy?
translation.zh: 我走了 你靠自己吧

translation.en: -I can't handle this on my own! -[baby squeals]
translation.zh: 你疯了吗？我自己可对付不了

translation.en: Please help me. Just until I can send them back where they came from.
translation.zh:
求你帮帮我
等我把他们送回去再走

translation.en: Wrangling space babies was not part of my schedule today, okay?
translation.zh:
看管太空宝宝
可不在我今天的日程里 好吗？

translation.en: Hmm. You are pathetic.
translation.zh: 你太惨了

translation.en: -[babies cooing] -I gotta call my parents.
translation.zh: 我得给我爸妈打电话

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Mom. Yeah, I know.
translation.zh: 妈 对 我知道

translation.en: This big project just got... a lot bigger than I thought.
translation.zh: 没想到这个大项目这么大

translation.en: Might go pretty late.
translation.zh: 我可能要到很晚

translation.en: Okay. Bye!
translation.zh: 好的 再见

translation.en: What? Ew.
translation.zh: 怎么？

translation.en: Uh. What's--
translation.zh: 什么…

translation.en: Oh, Titus.
translation.zh: 噢 泰特斯

translation.en: -[Reid] Oh, smells so bad I can see it. -[Melanie] That's pure human suffering.
translation.zh: 好臭啊 我都能看到了 太惨无人道了

translation.en: [Captain] I finally found your secret lair, Arcannis.
translation.zh: 我终于找到你的巢穴了 阿坎尼斯

translation.en: [base leader] Captain, careful. Walking into that lair
translation.zh:
队长 小心 走入这个巢穴
就像走入七层死亡意面一样

translation.en: is like walking into a seven layer lasagna of death.
translation.zh:
走入这个巢穴
就像走入七层死亡意面一样

translation.en: Then get me my bib.
translation.zh: 那就把围嘴给我

translation.en: I'm going in to get my babies back, and it's about to get messy.
translation.zh: 我要把我的宝宝们救回来 会有点混乱

translation.en: [Captain] Nine against one? That hardly seems fair.
translation.zh: 九对一？有点不公平啊

translation.en: Looks like you guys could use a recharge.
translation.zh: 给你们充充电

translation.en: [game narrator] Game on.
translation.zh: 游戏开始

translation.en: Power up.
translation.zh: 加电

translation.en: Hold it down.
translation.zh: 小声点

translation.en: Sorry. Did I cut you off?
translation.zh: 抱歉 我把你切成两半了吗？

translation.en: [game narrator echoing] Level up.
translation.zh: 已升级

translation.en: Thanks for the workout, guys.
translation.zh: 谢谢帮我热身 各位

translation.en: Palladium? I've got no powers.
translation.zh: 钯？我是去能力了

translation.en: Surprise.
translation.zh: 给你惊喜！

translation.en: I'm not here right now.
translation.zh: 我现在不在这里

translation.en: And neither are your precious children.
translation.zh: 你的宝贝孩子们也不在

translation.en: Please, make yourself at home.
translation.zh: 就当在自己家里

translation.en: If your home is a maze of merciless death traps!
translation.zh: 你家是无情的死亡陷阱组成的迷宫

translation.en: I'm no good at mazes!
translation.zh: 我不擅长走迷宫！

translation.en: [Arcannis] Ugh. Fleech.
translation.zh: 跳蛭

translation.en: So sorry, master.
translation.zh: 真对不起 主人

translation.en: Give me the scanner.
translation.zh: 把扫描器给我

translation.en: All right, then.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: This blasted planet is thick with interference.
translation.zh: 这个烂星球有很强的干扰

translation.en: Radio waves, satellite waves.
translation.zh: 无线电波 卫星

translation.en: It's time for a little help from my friends.
translation.zh: 我的朋友们该帮帮忙了

translation.en: Hello, my darlings. Off you go.
translation.zh: 你好 亲爱的 出发吧

translation.en: Find my little runaways.
translation.zh: 帮我把小逃犯们找出来

translation.en: -Fleech, did you set this on stun? -Ah.
translation.zh: 跳蛭 有没有设置成电极模式？

translation.en: Hm. Yes, you did.
translation.zh: 好的 设置了

translation.en: The pod is close.
translation.zh: 舱体就在附近

translation.en: It appears we have landed on...
translation.zh: 似乎我们降落到了…

translation.en: -Earth? -Verr...
translation.zh: 地球？

translation.en: That's the name?
translation.zh: 就叫这个名字？

translation.en: -Sounds like a stomach virus. -Ew.
translation.zh: 听起来像胃病毒

translation.en: Or the name of a pet worm.
translation.zh: 或者是宠物虫的名字

translation.en: Or a type of mucous.
translation.zh: 也可能是一种粘液

translation.en: -[imitates farting sounds] -Uh. Yes. That's it.
translation.zh: 对 没错

translation.en: When a Noglar squats in the woods...
translation.zh: 当诺格罗在树林里蹲下时

translation.en: it takes an "earth."
translation.zh: 它拉出了一个“球”

translation.en: Oh. Wow.
translation.zh: 哇！

translation.en: Is this what I think it is?
translation.zh: 不会是那个吧？

translation.en: -Oh. -[Captain] You evil scum.
translation.zh: 你这邪恶的渣滓

translation.en: I'm gonna blast you into the Jade Nebula when I find you.
translation.zh: 让我找到你 我把你炸到玉星云里去

translation.en: -Captain Lightspeed? Is that you? -Who are you talking to?
translation.zh:
-光速队长？是你吗？
-你在和谁说话？

translation.en: It's the captain, you know? Remember the-- Oh.
translation.zh: 是队长 记得…

translation.en: This is Captain Darius Lightspeed, Galactic Defense Commander.
translation.zh:
我是大流士·光速队长
银河防卫指挥官

translation.en: Uh, this is Reid. Senior, McKinley High School.
translation.zh: 我是里德 麦金利高中高三学生

translation.en: What have you done with my children, Reid Senior McKinley High School?
translation.zh:
你对我的孩子们做了什么
麦金利高中高三学生里德？

translation.en: I'll vaporize you where you stand!
translation.zh: 我直接让你站着蒸发！

translation.en: Hold on. We're on the same side. I've been on a hundred missions with you.
translation.zh:
等等 咱们站在同一边
我和你完成了一百次任务了

translation.en: Shooting plasma falcons, breaking out of gravity prison,
translation.zh: 打等离子猎隼 从重力监狱逃走

translation.en: -remember the worm people? -Is he wearing a Danskin?
translation.zh: 记得虫人吗？ 他穿着女式紧身衣？

translation.en: [both] It's called a uniform!
translation.zh:
-是制服！
-是制服！

translation.en: -Did I call at a bad time? -Nothin' I can't handle.
translation.zh:
-时间不合适吗？
-没什么我处理不了的

translation.en: Just another day on the job.
translation.zh: 很普通的一天罢了

translation.en: Don't change the subject. Do you have my babies or not?
translation.zh:
别转移话题
我的宝宝在不在你这里？

translation.en: [Reid] I do have them. They've destroyed my home.
translation.zh: 在我这里 他们把我家都毁了

translation.en: You need to pick them up ASAP.
translation.zh: 你得赶紧把他们带走

translation.en: Reid, no other mission is more important than this.
translation.zh: 里德 没有什么任务比这个更重要了

translation.en: I need you to keep my kids safe.
translation.zh: 你要保我的孩子们安全

translation.en: Use their palladium pacifiers to neutralize their powers.
translation.zh: 用他们的钯奶嘴抵消他们的能力

translation.en: Right. Okay.
translation.zh: 对 好的

translation.en: There's more. If you have the babies, Arcannis is coming for you.
translation.zh:
而且 宝宝在你这里
阿坎尼斯会来找你

translation.en: Arcannis, who?
translation.zh: 阿坎尼斯 谁？

translation.en: Dr. Arcannis.
translation.zh: 阿坎尼斯博士

translation.en: The most devious criminal mind in the galaxy.
translation.zh: 银河系最邪恶的罪犯

translation.en: Yup, that's the guy.
translation.zh: 对 就是他

translation.en: Looks like the Grinch got some bad plastic surgery.
translation.zh: 看起来像整容失败的绿毛怪

translation.en: If he gets a hold of my children, he will take their powers as his own.
translation.zh:
如果他抓住我的孩子们
他会夺走他们的超能力

translation.en: And the first planet he conquers will be yours.
translation.zh: 而他首先就会征服你们的星球

translation.en: Okay. I'm out.
translation.zh: 好的 我走了

translation.en: I'm afraid you've both been marked.
translation.zh: 恐怕你俩都被标记了

translation.en: -I don't wanna be marked. -Well, you are.
translation.zh:
-我不想被标记
-可事实如此

translation.en: If I can track you, so can he. He probably already knows where you are.
translation.zh:
如果我能追踪你 他也可以
他很可能已经知道你在哪里

translation.en: Give me a second to trace your signal, and I'll be able to locate you.
translation.zh:
给我一秒钟追踪你的信号
我就能定位你

translation.en: I can't be marked. I've got my own plans. I wanna go to college.
translation.zh:
不能标记我
我有自己的安排 我要上大学

translation.en: I wanna get married.
translation.zh: 我要结婚

translation.en: I still have a $200 Sephora gift card I've never spent, and now I'm marked.
translation.zh: 我还有200美元丝芙兰礼品卡没用掉 可我居然被标记了

translation.en: -Dada. -No, no, no, don't!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: -No! -No!
translation.zh:
-不要！
-不要！

translation.en: He's gone.
translation.zh: 他没了

translation.en: How's he gonna find us now?
translation.zh: 他现在可怎么找到我们啊？

translation.en: Reid. We've gotta get out of here.
translation.zh: 里德 咱们得离开这里

translation.en: And don't think this gets you out of our science project.
translation.zh: 别以为这样你就不用做科学项目了

translation.en: I need an ETA on the surveillance truck and an ETA on lunch.
translation.zh: 我要知道监测卡车的抵达时间 还有午餐的抵达时间

translation.en: No onions on the burger this time.
translation.zh: 这次汉堡里不要放洋葱

translation.en: No... onions.
translation.zh: 不要放洋葱

translation.en: [Arcannis] Ah, the smell of ripe diaper.
translation.zh: 啊 用过的尿片的气味

translation.en: -They were here, all right. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 他们之前在这里 好的

translation.en: Looks just like my lab.
translation.zh: 和我的实验室情况差不多

translation.en: They are getting stronger.
translation.zh: 他们在变强

translation.en: We must find my little runaways quickly.
translation.zh: 我们必须尽快找到我的小逃犯们

translation.en: We are so close. I can smell them.
translation.zh: 我们很接近了 我能闻到他们的气味

translation.en: I will find you.
translation.zh: 我会找到你

translation.en: Do you mind?
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: We have to call our parents and the police. This has gone far enough.
translation.zh: 好的 咱们得给爸妈打电话 还有报警 这已经够过分了

translation.en: We can't call anyone. You heard Lightspeed, Arcannis is tracking us.
translation.zh:
不能打 光速的话你听见了
阿坎尼斯在追踪我们

translation.en: He could be tracking our phones. You don't wanna put your family
translation.zh: 他可能在追踪我们的电话 你不想让家人也有危险吧？

translation.en: in danger too, do you? No! No kicking, please, space babies.
translation.zh: 你不想让家人也有危险吧？ 请不要踢 太空宝宝

translation.en: Do not let them tear this car apart.
translation.zh: 别让他们把这辆车搞烂

translation.en: Let's find some music?
translation.zh: 咱们找点音乐吧？

translation.en: Okay. They love Lionel Richie.
translation.zh: 好 他们很喜欢莱昂纳尔·里奇的歌

translation.en: -Seriously? -Hey. He's a national treasure.
translation.zh:
-真的？
-哎 他是国宝

translation.en: These guys get it.
translation.zh: 他们懂

translation.en: What is this?
translation.zh: 这是干嘛？

translation.en: Oh no.
translation.zh: 噢 不是吧

translation.en: Okay, everybody be cool. You babies, be cool.
translation.zh: 好的 大家冷静 宝宝们 冷静

translation.en: You be cool.
translation.zh: 你冷静

translation.en: Maybe we just hand these kids over to them.
translation.zh: 要不直接把孩子们交给他们

translation.en: Are you kidding? Have you heard what the military does to aliens?
translation.zh:
你开什么玩笑？
军队怎么对外星人你也知道的

translation.en: -Can you cut the music? -But he's a national treasure.
translation.zh:
-能关掉音乐吗？
-可他是国宝啊

translation.en: Where're you kids going today?
translation.zh: 孩子们去哪里？

translation.en: -Camping! -Road trip. Uh...
translation.zh:
-露营
-自驾

translation.en: -Camping road trip, to go camping. -What he said.
translation.zh:
-露营自驾 去露营
-对 没错

translation.en: Is the air safe out here?
translation.zh: 这里的空气安全吗？

translation.en: Just a precaution. We'll ask the questions.
translation.zh: 只是预防措施 我们来提问

translation.en: We're checking cars for anything peculiar.
translation.zh: 我们要检查车上有没有异常

translation.en: Nothin' peculiar here.
translation.zh: 这里没有异常

translation.en: Uh, very, very normal car. We're all normal here. How are you?
translation.zh:
非常正常的车
我们都很正常 你还好吗？

translation.en: -We're gonna need to look in the trunk. -No problem.
translation.zh:
-我们要看一下后备箱
-没问题

translation.en: Uh, nice mask.
translation.zh: 面罩不错

translation.en: Any relation to Darth?
translation.zh: 和达斯·维德有关吗？

translation.en: You packed a toaster.
translation.zh: 你还带了面包机

translation.en: I've never been camping. I had no idea what I'd need.
translation.zh: 我以前没露营过 也不知道需要什么

translation.en: You've got roller skates here too.
translation.zh: 还带了溜冰鞋

translation.en: I really didn't think it through on a lot of this. I see that now.
translation.zh: 我确实没考虑太周全 现在明白了

translation.en: Is that a pool noodle?
translation.zh: 还带了游泳圈？

translation.en: Uhh... you never know.
translation.zh: 说不好就用得着

translation.en: So, uh, you're not much of a talker, are you?
translation.zh: 你话不多啊 是吧？

translation.en: -Hey! Stop! -Bye-bye.
translation.zh:
-哎！停下！
-再见

translation.en: Get back here with my jeep! Get back here! Hey!
translation.zh: 把我的吉普车开回来！回来！

translation.en: Oh, we are so going to jail.
translation.zh: 噢 咱们坐牢坐定了

translation.en: No, no, no! I don't wanna die this way! -No! Huh! I don't wanna die this way! No! -[giggles]
translation.zh: 不要啊 我不想这样死！

translation.en: -No! -[yells]
translation.zh: 不要啊！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不要啊！

translation.en: What's going on here?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: -How-- -What happened?
translation.zh:
-怎么可能…
-怎么了？

translation.en: -We've gotta get back on the road. -There was a bubble.
translation.zh:
-我们得继续上路了
-刚才有一个气泡

translation.en: You saw a bubble?
translation.zh: 气泡？

translation.en: I was in a bubble. A big purple, a big purple balloon.
translation.zh:
我刚才在一个气泡里
很大的紫色气球

translation.en: That doesn't make sense. Does that make sense?
translation.zh: 不可能 可能吗？

translation.en: Nope, no sense.
translation.zh: 不可能

translation.en: I was in a big bubble. I'm serious.
translation.zh: 我刚才在一个大气泡里 真的

translation.en: It's those babies. One of 'em took my car.
translation.zh:
是因为宝宝
有一个宝宝开走了我的车

translation.en: He chased me.
translation.zh: 开车撵我

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa, a baby stole your car?
translation.zh: 哎 一个宝宝偷走了你的车？

translation.en: Is your mask on too tight, Ronnie?
translation.zh: 你的面罩是不是太紧了 罗尼？

translation.en: No. I mean... I don't-- I don't think so.
translation.zh: 没有 应该不是

translation.en: [Reid] Whoa, baby.
translation.zh: 哇 宝宝

translation.en: Titus...
translation.zh: 泰特斯

translation.en: put the car down.
translation.zh: 把车放下

translation.en: Yes. Now.
translation.zh: 对 现在放下

translation.en: No, don't throw it!
translation.zh: 不要 别扔！

translation.en: Well, he put it down.
translation.zh: 呃 还是放下了

translation.en: No cookie for you, Titus! No cookie!
translation.zh: 你没饼干吃了 泰特斯！

translation.en: I'm so sorry. Have a nice day. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 真对不起 祝你们过得愉快

translation.en: Okay, let's turn up that music.
translation.zh: 好的 咱们打开音乐

translation.en: -We gotta get off the road. -[Melanie] I know the perfect place.
translation.zh:
-不能继续在路上开了
-我知道有个特别好的地方

translation.en: Mother of all things holy.
translation.zh: 我的天哪！

translation.en: Our sweet green Earth is living on borrowed time.
translation.zh: 咱们美好的绿色地球命不久矣

translation.en: My guess puts these creatures at six, seven feet tall.
translation.zh: 我猜这些生物有一米八两米高

translation.en: Some kind of space predator.
translation.zh: 太空捕食者

translation.en: Multiple arms, possibly tentacles.
translation.zh: 多手 可能是触须

translation.en: Claws of a wolverine.
translation.zh: 狼人的爪子

translation.en: They probably shoot spider babies right outta their face.
translation.zh: 很可能直接从脸上射出小蜘蛛

translation.en: -[sniffs] -[soldier] General.
translation.zh: 将军

translation.en: -Neighbors saw a car leave two hours ago. -Get me that plate.
translation.zh:
-邻居看见一辆车两小时前开走
-给我查车牌号

translation.en: Put that in a bag with a number on it. Somebody hand me a clipboard.
translation.zh: 标号装袋 笔记板给我

translation.en: General, we got a hit at one of the checkpoints.
translation.zh: 将军 我们在一个检查点被袭击了

translation.en: Something they're calling super freaky-deaky.
translation.zh: 他们说非常怪异

translation.en: Define freaky-deaky, Private.
translation.zh: 定义一下什么叫怪异 二等兵

translation.en: -Babies. Babies. Babies -Babies? Babies? Babies?
translation.zh:
-宝宝
-宝宝？

translation.en: What do you mean, babies?
translation.zh: 什么意思 宝宝？

translation.en: Super-powered alien babies. Cute but deadly.
translation.zh: 超能外星宝宝 可爱但致命

translation.en: They... probably shape-shifted into the form of their human victims.
translation.zh: 他们很可能是变形成了被害的人类

translation.en: Put out an APB, all channels!
translation.zh: 全境通缉 所有渠道发送！

translation.en: We're looking for infants... of mass destruction.
translation.zh: 我们要寻找大规模杀伤性婴儿

translation.en: You got anything in your date planner about surviving in the woods?
translation.zh:
你的约会计划器中
有如何在森林中生存的信息吗？

translation.en: [Melanie] You're talking to Camp Nogiwa's "Camper of the Year," gamer boy.
translation.zh: 我可是“年度露营者” 游戏小子

translation.en: Come on, Fearless. Let's set up camp.
translation.zh: 来吧 无畏 咱们建立营地

translation.en: Hey. How about a hand? Aren't you supposed to be super strong?
translation.zh: 哎 帮个忙吧？你不是超级强壮吗？

translation.en: Oh, no, baby, don't--! Uh...
translation.zh: 不要 宝宝 不要…

translation.en: But please tell me you brought some toilet paper.
translation.zh: 你带卫生纸了吧？

translation.en: Well, I've got some drive-through receipts in the car.
translation.zh: 车里有一些快餐店的收据

translation.en: I was supposed to go to Red Lobster with my girlfriends tonight.
translation.zh: 我今晚本来要和闺蜜们去红龙虾餐厅

translation.en: -Are you gonna be able to fix that thing? -I'd better. Or I'm gonna miss Crabfest.
translation.zh: 你能修好这东西吗？ 最好要修好 否则就要错过螃蟹节了

translation.en: Besides, it's just a machine. There has to be a way.
translation.zh: 而且 这只是机器罢了 一定有办法

translation.en: Uh, just seems like we're a little out of our league here, y'know?
translation.zh: 不过似乎我们有点不自量力了

translation.en: Well, all we can do is try, y'know? Put in some effort?
translation.zh: 咱们只能尽力尝试 花点功夫

translation.en: We need to get this done, so we can get back to our science project.
translation.zh:
得把这个问题解决
然后就能做我们的科学项目了

translation.en: Think that brain of yours can solve something other than a video game?
translation.zh:
你的脑子除了玩电子游戏
应该还能解决别的问题吧？

translation.en: Hey, little guy.
translation.zh: 哎 小伙子

translation.en: Uh, I wonder what you're thinkin'. I wonder--
translation.zh: 不知你在想什么 不知…

translation.en: [Melanie laughs] You said it, Titus.
translation.zh: 你说了 泰特斯

translation.en: Uh! Where have they gone?
translation.zh: 他们上哪儿去了？

translation.en: Oh! You got me.
translation.zh: 噢！你赢了

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Radio repair.
translation.zh: 无线电修理

translation.en: [phone] Rainbows and Bears.
translation.zh: 无限的秀丽

translation.en: Oh, come on.
translation.zh: 噢 拜托

translation.en: -Titus! Do not drop a tree on your sister. -[giggles]
translation.zh: 泰特斯 别把树压在你妹妹身上

translation.en: -He did that on his own. -He's really getting better.
translation.zh:
-他自己做到的
-他真的越来越厉害了

translation.en: [sighs] These pieces are so tiny. I can't see what I'm doing.
translation.zh: 这东西太小了 我根本看不清楚

translation.en: Let me try something.
translation.zh: 我来试试

translation.en: Xander, can you make this? Make big ones.
translation.zh: 赞德 你能把这个放大吗？

translation.en: Oh, man. He's doing it.
translation.zh: 哇！他做到了

translation.en: That does help.
translation.zh: 确实有帮助

translation.en: Look. Spin this one, it fits here.
translation.zh: 看 这个转一下 就能按上

translation.en: -Okay. I see it. -There we go.
translation.zh:
-好的 我看见了
-这样就行了

translation.en: Pretty good, Xander.
translation.zh: 非常好 赞德

translation.en: You did it. Genius.
translation.zh: 你成功了 天才

translation.en: Did you have any doubt?
translation.zh: 你之前有怀疑吗？

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Eight, nine, ten. Yup, still got 'em all.
translation.zh: 八 九 十 嗯 还是把它们都解决了

translation.en: Captain's log. I continue to wander this maze like a rat.
translation.zh:
队长日志 我继续在迷宫中徘徊
像老鼠一样

translation.en: It's endless. Dead end.
translation.zh: 没有止境 死路一条

translation.en: Or not.
translation.zh: 也可能不是

translation.en: Captain's log. I hate mazes.
translation.zh: 队长日志 我讨厌迷宫

translation.en: Bling?
translation.zh: 叮？

translation.en: You gotta be kidding me.
translation.zh: 开什么玩笑

translation.en: You gotta be kidding!
translation.zh: 开什么玩笑！

translation.en: This is our best vantage point to scan the entire town.
translation.zh: 这是扫描整个镇子的有利位置

translation.en: Access the drones.
translation.zh: 接入无人机

translation.en: [mother] Are you listening to me?
translation.zh:
-你在听我说话吗？
-我听你说了一天了 妈妈

translation.en: [daughter] I listen to you all day, Mother.Do you ever listen to me?
translation.zh:
-你在听我说话吗？
-我听你说了一天了 妈妈 你听过我说话吗？

translation.en: [barista] That's a grande mocha half-caf macchiato, no whip, no foam.
translation.zh:
这是大杯摩卡半咖啡因玛奇朵
不加鲜奶油和奶泡

translation.en: [piano teacher] …3, and 4. And 1, and 2, and 3--
translation.zh: 三 四 一 二 三…

translation.en: [DJ] Yo yo. Takin' your calls. It's your boy, UP NYC on The Noize 105 FM.
translation.zh:
哎 接电话 我是你朋友
来自调频105

translation.en: -Hit me up. Tell me what you wanna hear. -[mutters angrily]
translation.zh: 说吧 告诉我你想听什么

translation.en: Hey now, don't be shy. You on The Noize.
translation.zh: 哎 别害羞 现在正在直播

translation.en: Who's this?
translation.zh: 哪位？

translation.en: This is Dr. Arcannis, overlord of cosmic domination.
translation.zh: 我是阿坎尼斯博士 宇宙之主

translation.en: Yo, whaddup, Einstein? What song you wanna play on the hit list?
translation.zh: 你好 爱因斯坦 你想播放什么歌曲？

translation.en: I don't have time for this.
translation.zh: 我没时间搞这些

translation.en: "I Don't Have Time For This" by Dreadlock Killah.
translation.zh: 长发杀手的《我没时间搞这些》

translation.en: -That's not what I mean. -"That's Not What I Mean" by MC Saltshaka.
translation.zh:
-我不是这个意思
-撒盐者的《我不是这个意思》

translation.en: I am looking for babies.
translation.zh: 我在找宝宝

translation.en: "Looking For My Baby" by JJ Squash.
translation.zh: JJ-Squash的《寻找我的宝宝》

translation.en: Stop this foolishness.
translation.zh: 别胡说八道了

translation.en: You will soon be my slaves, and this planet will be a wasteland!
translation.zh: 你们很快将会成为我的奴隶 而这个星球将成为不毛之地！

translation.en: Congratulations, my man. You just requested the new jam of the week.
translation.zh: 恭喜 兄弟 你点了本周新歌

translation.en: -How is that even possible? -[DJ] "You Will Be My Slaves,
translation.zh:
怎么可能呢？ 欧里庇得斯的《你将成为我的奴隶
这个星球将成为不毛之地》

translation.en: And This Planet Will Be My Wasteland" by DJ Euripides.
translation.zh:
欧里庇得斯的《你将成为我的奴隶
这个星球将成为不毛之地》

translation.en: [Melanie] At least we put this thing back together, but it's still not working.
translation.zh:
至少咱们把这东西装回去了
不过还是不管用

translation.en: -Maybe it's a power thing? -The signal is really weak.
translation.zh: 也许是没电？ 信号很弱

translation.en: We need to, like, hijack a satellite for this.
translation.zh: 我们得劫持卫星来才行

translation.en: Use some NASA-level gear.
translation.zh: 用宇航局等级的装备

translation.en: Let me make a call to NASA. I'll get right on it.
translation.zh:
噢 我来给宇航局打个电话
让他们立刻办

translation.en: [laughs] You're not half bad at this stuff when you put your mind to it.
translation.zh: 你用心做的时候做得其实很不错

translation.en: Uh, thank you?
translation.zh: 谢谢？

translation.en: Maybe it's all the fresh air and trees and bugs and going potty in the woods.
translation.zh:
也许是因为森林里的新鲜空气
树木 虫子 还有发疯

translation.en: Opens up my mind a bit.
translation.zh: 把我的思维打开了点

translation.en: Wow. Look at you. Acknowledging there's a real world.
translation.zh: 哇 看看你！承认真实世界的存在！

translation.en: Maybe you're not a complete lost cause after all.
translation.zh: 也许你也并不是完全不可救药

translation.en: [chuckles] Maybe not.
translation.zh: 也许是的

translation.en: So... any plans after we graduate,
translation.zh: 对了 咱们毕业后有什么计划吗？

translation.en: or are you just gonna float around in virtual reality?
translation.zh: 还是就在虚拟现实中四处漂浮？

translation.en: At least in the game world, you don't get called names, flunk a class,
translation.zh:
哎 至少在游戏世界
不会被骂 不会考试不及格

translation.en: or get turned down for prom. It's all about the fun.
translation.zh: 不会舞会被拒 都是因为快乐

translation.en: Here in the real world, I've got my fingers crossed for MIT.
translation.zh:
在这个真实世界中
我祈祷能上麻省理工

translation.en: Majoring in biochemical engineering.
translation.zh: 主修生化工程

translation.en: Wow. You've got it all planned out.
translation.zh: 哇！你都计划好了

translation.en: Well, sure. Even those ducks are charting a course, Reid.
translation.zh: 肯定的 连鸭子都在计划路线 里德

translation.en: They don't just drift wherever the current goes.
translation.zh: 而不是随波逐流

translation.en: Is that all you're gonna do? Just drift?
translation.zh: 你会这样吗？随波逐流？

translation.en: I'm sick of working on this. Time to work on a sandwich.
translation.zh: 我做累了 该做一个三明治了

translation.en: -Hope you like pastrami. -[cooing]
translation.zh: 希望你喜欢烟熏肉

translation.en: You guys like pastrami?
translation.zh: 你们喜欢烟熏肉吗？

translation.en: Little pastrami on rye. Got some kraut and mustard. I'm making Reubens.
translation.zh: 黑麦烟熏肉三明治 放点泡菜和芥末 我来做鲁宾三明治

translation.en: -[whines] -Hey, don't get cranky.
translation.zh: 哎 别暴躁

translation.en: Look at these two guys. They're not cranky. Look.
translation.zh: 看看他们俩 他们俩不暴躁

translation.en: [in deep voice] Hi, Mr. Spoon. That's Dr. Spoon from space.
translation.zh: 你好 勺子先生 这是太空来的勺子博士

translation.en: Get away from me.
translation.zh: 走开！

translation.en: -I have a PhD! -[laughing]
translation.zh: 我有博士学位！

translation.en: How about, um...
translation.zh: 这样

translation.en: I'm Colonel Mustard. What's the ruckus?
translation.zh: 我是芥末上校 吵什么？

translation.en: [in French accent] Please, no fighting. I'm just a moist towelette.
translation.zh: 拜托 不要吵 我只是一片湿纸巾

translation.en: Don't play with Dr. Spoon like that. You're gonna hurt him.
translation.zh: 哎 别这样玩勺子博士 会弄伤他的

translation.en: Hey, let's play peekaboo.
translation.zh: 哎 咱们来玩躲猫猫

translation.en: -This guy loves peekaboo. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-他很喜欢躲猫猫
-对

translation.en: -Peek. Peek. -[squeals]
translation.zh: 躲

translation.en: Peek. Peekaboo, huh?
translation.zh: 躲猫猫

translation.en: -[Melanie] Don't scare him. -Here I go.
translation.zh:
-里德 别吓到他
-我来咯

translation.en: -[Melanie] You'll set his powers off. -Hmm.
translation.zh:
-会把他的能力吓掉
-准备好

translation.en: If you can't see my face, where am I?
translation.zh: 如果看不见我的脸 那我在哪里？

translation.en: -[Melanie] You got too big. -Peekaboo!
translation.zh:
-你玩太大了
-躲猫猫！

translation.en: -[Melanie] I told you not to scare him! -[Reid] Okay, everybody in the car!
translation.zh:
-兄弟 我跟你说别吓着他！
-好 大家上车！

translation.en: Captain's log: more maze.
translation.zh: 队长日志 还是在迷宫里

translation.en: This part is different. Maybe it's a way out.
translation.zh: 这里不一样 也许是出路

translation.en: Nope. Just the opposite.
translation.zh: 不是 恰恰相反

translation.en: That sounds...
translation.zh: 听声音

translation.en: alive.
translation.zh: 是活的

translation.en: Looks like Arcannis's monster had some babies.
translation.zh: 看来阿坎尼斯的怪物有不少宝宝

translation.en: That's fitting. Killed by babies.
translation.zh: 挺合适 被宝宝杀死

translation.en: Very ironic.
translation.zh: 非常讽刺

translation.en: [Melanie] At least he leaves a trail.
translation.zh: 至少他留下了踪迹

translation.en: Xander! Xander!
translation.zh: 赞德！

translation.en: -Xander, don't move. -[crying]
translation.zh: 赞德 别动

translation.en: It's okay, Xander.
translation.zh: 没事的 赞德

translation.en: Hey! What-- [grunts]
translation.zh: 哎 搞什么？

translation.en: The driver's still in there!
translation.zh: 司机还在车里！

translation.en: -Hey! The door is stuck! -Wait, hold on. One second, okay?
translation.zh: 哎！门打不开了！ 等等 稍等 好吗？

translation.en: -Hey! -[cries]
translation.zh: 哎！

translation.en: Good boy, Titus. Okay, hold on.
translation.zh: 好孩子 泰特斯 坚持住

translation.en: Oh, why won't it... budge!
translation.zh: 怎么不动呢？

translation.en: [panting] I'm okay. How much milk is that kid drinking?
translation.zh: 我没事！ 这孩子喝多少奶啊？

translation.en: -[people cheering] -[chuckles] Look at that. These babies could be heroes.
translation.zh: 看看 宝宝们当了英雄

translation.en: Yay, Titus.
translation.zh: 好哎 泰特斯

translation.en: -Or not. -Uh-oh.
translation.zh: 也可能不是

translation.en: What was in there?
translation.zh: 车上有什么？

translation.en: Just a lot of priceless artifacts from a museum.
translation.zh: 就是博物馆的许多无价文物罢了

translation.en: You know, 17th century Ming Dynasty, things that can never be replaced.
translation.zh: 无法替代的17世纪明朝的东西

translation.en: -And my house keys were in there. -It's not that long of a drop.
translation.zh:
还有我家的钥匙也在车上 这里掉下去并不是很高
一定没事

translation.en: -I'm sure everything's fine. -[blasts]
translation.zh:
这里掉下去并不是很高
一定没事

translation.en: Okay, pacifiers for everyone.
translation.zh: 好的 全都戴上奶嘴

translation.en: We better get outta here.
translation.zh: 咱们最好赶紧离开

translation.en: Oh no.
translation.zh: 不是吧

translation.en: Keep your human skin suits on and your hands where we can see them.
translation.zh: 人皮衣服不要脱 举起手来

translation.en: Stand down, alien menace!
translation.zh: 投降吧 外星来客！

translation.en: I'm not an alien menace.
translation.zh: 我不是外星来客

translation.en: That's just what an alien menace would say.
translation.zh: 外星来客当然会这么说

translation.en: You shoot any spider babies outta your face, we will take you out.
translation.zh:
如果从脸上射出小蜘蛛
我们就干掉你

translation.en: Oh.
translation.zh: （基拉）

translation.en: Do not be swayed by their cute demeanor and chubby cheeks!
translation.zh:
不要被他们可爱的动作
和肥嘟嘟的脸所动摇！

translation.en: Quarantine this area right now.
translation.zh: 立即隔离该区域

translation.en: Careful. Keep away from their mouth and hands.
translation.zh: 小心 远离他们的嘴和手

translation.en: Ew. We've got saliva.
translation.zh: 有唾液

translation.en: Get a stool sample! Send those diapers to the CDC!
translation.zh: 粪便取样！把尿布送去疾控中心！

translation.en: They're just babies! Don't hurt them!
translation.zh: 他们只是宝宝 不要伤害他们！

translation.en: They like Lionel Richie. Mostly his greatest hits.
translation.zh:
他们喜欢莱昂纳尔·里奇
主要是喜欢他的热门歌曲

translation.en: Well, you've tested human.
translation.zh: 好的 检测显示你们是人类

translation.en: I just need to know why you're working for them.
translation.zh: 为什么要为他们工作？

translation.en: This is a big misunderstanding.
translation.zh: 这里面有大误会

translation.en: All I did was accidentally open up a wormhole by playing a video game.
translation.zh:
我只不过是因为玩电子游戏
意外地打开了一个虫洞

translation.en: Planet Master? Do you know it?
translation.zh: 《星球大师》听过吗？

translation.en: And who are you calling on this?
translation.zh: 你们用这个呼叫谁？

translation.en: The Russians? The French? The French Canadians?
translation.zh: 俄国人？法国人？法裔加拿大人？

translation.en: The Canadian Russians? Martian communists?
translation.zh: 加拿大裔俄国人？火星共产分子？

translation.en: No! But there's someone else you should be worried about.
translation.zh: 不是！但是有一个人很可怕

translation.en: I can't even believe she told you that.
translation.zh: 没想到她这样对你说

translation.en: She did. And then she says to me that she wants to see other people.
translation.zh: 确实如此 然后她对我说想找其他人

translation.en: Ouch, that's cold.
translation.zh: 哎 好冷酷

translation.en: So she's single?
translation.zh: 她单身？

translation.en: What? Did you seriously just say she--
translation.zh: 什么？你居然说她…

translation.en: Say what, Nate?
translation.zh: 说什么 内特？

translation.en: Nate.
translation.zh: 内特

translation.en: HQ--
translation.zh: 总部…

translation.en: Hold that thought.
translation.zh: 记住了

translation.en: I'm confused here.
translation.zh: 我搞不懂了

translation.en: We tracked an alien pod to you two,
translation.zh: 我们追踪外星舱体 找到了你们俩

translation.en: but all our background searches come up with are Red Lobster, Sephora,
translation.zh:
但是背景调查
却只查到了红龙虾和丝芙兰

translation.en: Pinkberry and a website called acnesolutions.com
translation.zh: 粉红莓冰品店和痤疮治疗网

translation.en: What? [splutters] No, that's, uh, I've never heard of...
translation.zh: 什么？没听过

translation.en: In all my days as a Marine, a Navy Seal,
translation.zh:
这么多年 我当过陆战队员
海豹队突击员

translation.en: LAPD, FBI, and a Girl Scout Leader of the Year,
translation.zh:
洛杉矶警察 联邦调查局探员
以及年度女童军队长

translation.en: I've never heard such a load of--
translation.zh: 但我从没听过这么多胡…

translation.en: [soldier] General, we have intruders. They're moving to--
translation.zh: 将军 有入侵者 他们在往…

translation.en: Moving where?
translation.zh: 往哪里？

translation.en: Come back, soldier!
translation.zh: 回答 战士！

translation.en: Perimeter, report!
translation.zh: 报告情况！

translation.en: Until I know what's going on, you will do nothing and go nowhere.
translation.zh:
我去了解情况 在此之前
你们什么都不准干 哪儿都不准去

translation.en: -Understood? -Let us help.
translation.zh:
-明白吗？
-我们来帮忙

translation.en: Do nothing, go nowhere.
translation.zh: 什么都不准干 哪儿都不准去

translation.en: Who does she think she is? They can't keep us in here.
translation.zh:
她以为自己是谁啊？ 他们不能把我们关在这里
一定有办法出…

translation.en: -There's gotta be a way out of-- -Shhh.
translation.zh:
他们不能把我们关在这里
一定有办法出…

translation.en: -I don't hear anything. -Exactly.
translation.zh:
-我什么都没听到
-没错

translation.en: It's him, Dr. Arcannis.
translation.zh: 是他 阿坎尼斯博士

translation.en: [laughs] We're going for a little ride.
translation.zh: 咱们走吧

translation.en: Fleech, get them in the sport utility vehicle.
translation.zh: 跳蛭 让他们上车

translation.en: Mark this day in your planet's history, hoomans.
translation.zh: 在你们星球历史上记住这一天 人类

translation.en: -My little helpers are about to make me... -[babies crying] ...the most powerful being in the universe!
translation.zh:
我的小帮手们
即将使我成为宇宙最强的存在！

translation.en: What is this?
translation.zh: 这是干嘛？

translation.en: They're gone.
translation.zh: 他们走了

translation.en: -What? Sh-- Should we go after them? -And do what?
translation.zh: 什么？咱们要追吗？ 追了又怎么样？

translation.en: I saw the warning. But I didn't listen.
translation.zh: 我看到了警告信息 但是我没听

translation.en: I just wanted to win.
translation.zh: 我只是想赢

translation.en: This isn't a game. It's real.
translation.zh: 这不是游戏 是真的

translation.en: The whole Earth is doomed, and it's my fault.
translation.zh: 整个地球都完了 都怪我

translation.en: -Come on. You are Fearless. -No, don't call me that.
translation.zh:
-拜托 你是无畏
-不 别这样叫我

translation.en: I'm not Fearless. I'm useless.
translation.zh: 我不是无畏 我是无用

translation.en: Just my luck. They're teethin'.
translation.zh: 是我运气好 它们在长牙

translation.en: I'm not as tasty as I look. Who am I kidding? I'm probably delicious.
translation.zh:
我没有看起来那么好吃
开什么玩笑呢？我大概是很美味

translation.en: No use fighting it. There's no way out of this one.
translation.zh: 再打也没用了 这次出不去了

translation.en: I'm-- I'm never gonna see my babies again.
translation.zh: 我永远也见不到宝宝们了

translation.en: I can plan a Red Cross food drive, a homecoming dance,
translation.zh:
我可以策划红十字食品募捐
和返校节舞会

translation.en: I can raise $8,000 to save the elephants.
translation.zh: 我可以筹款8000美元去拯救大象

translation.en: But this? I'm-- I'm all out of ideas, Reid.
translation.zh: 但是这种事？我没办法了 里德

translation.en: This would be so much easier if it was a video game.
translation.zh: 如果是电子游戏 那就容易多了

translation.en: Wait a minute.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: What if this was a video game?
translation.zh: 如果这是电子游戏呢？

translation.en: What would you do?
translation.zh: 你会怎么做？

translation.en: I don't know. l'd look around for tools, for power-ups.
translation.zh: 不知道 我会四处找工具 提高能力

translation.en: I wouldn't give up.
translation.zh: 我不会放弃

translation.en: You know what? I've been living my whole life through a screen.
translation.zh: 跟你说 我一辈子都通过屏幕生活

translation.en: What good is it being Fearless in a fake world?
translation.zh: 在假的世界做无畏有什么意义？

translation.en: It's time to start being Fearless out here, where it counts.
translation.zh:
是时候在这里做无畏了
这才是重要的

translation.en: Wow. Somebody just got off the couch.
translation.zh: 哇！有人从沙发上爬起来了

translation.en: Let's find a way outta here, huh?
translation.zh: 咱们想办法逃出去 好吗？

translation.en: Wait a minute. I can't believe I didn't think of it before.
translation.zh: 等等 我居然之前没想到

translation.en: That's a sat phone.
translation.zh: 这是卫星电话

translation.en: It's a super powerful walkie-talkie.
translation.zh: 是超强大的对讲机

translation.en: They link to satellites. NASA-level gear.
translation.zh: 连接卫星 宇航局等级的装备

translation.en: It could boost our signal. You can fix the communicator.
translation.zh:
这也许能增强信号
就可以修好通信器了

translation.en: Yes! Now let's go stop Grinchface.
translation.zh: 对！咱们现在去阻止绿毛脸

translation.en: Game on.
translation.zh: 游戏开始

translation.en: General. You're gonna have to trust me. We're the good guys,
translation.zh: 将军 你得信任我 我们是好人 我们会阻止坏人

translation.en: -and we're gonna stop the bad guys. -If we can catch them in time.
translation.zh: 我们是好人 我们会阻止坏人 如果我们能及时赶上它们

translation.en: [Reid] Whoa! The Obsidian.
translation.zh: 哇！黑曜石号

translation.en: It's even cooler in person.
translation.zh: 当面看到更酷了

translation.en: You can take a selfie later!
translation.zh: 你晚点再自拍！

translation.en: Watch the road! [Reid] Whoa! Shrimp!
translation.zh:
-看路！
-哇！啊！

translation.en: Didn't you say you've ridden a motorcycle before?
translation.zh: 你不是说以前开过摩托吗？

translation.en: -Yes, in Planet Master. -What?
translation.zh:
-对 在《星球大师》里
-什么？

translation.en: Okay, it's now or never.
translation.zh: 好 就一次机会 一定要成功

translation.en: Sorry, this is a lot different than a rocket bike.
translation.zh: 抱歉 和火箭摩托差别很大

translation.en: Here goes.
translation.zh: 来了

translation.en: I think we're on.
translation.zh: 应该联系上了

translation.en: Hello? Come in, Captain. Captain, can you hear us?
translation.zh:
你好？请讲 队长
队长 能听见我们说话吗？

translation.en: -[beeps] -[Captain] This is Lightspeed.
translation.zh: 我是光速

translation.en: Good to hear your voice again.
translation.zh: 很高兴再听到你的声音

translation.en: -We got him! -Yeah!
translation.zh:
-联系到他了！
-好！

translation.en: -[Melanie] Arcannis has your babies. -What?
translation.zh:
-阿坎尼斯抓了你的宝宝们
-什么？

translation.en: They're on The Obsidian, but we won't let them get away.
translation.zh:
在黑曜石号上
但我们不会让它们逃走

translation.en: [Captain] I can finally pinpoint your location.
translation.zh: 我终于能定位你的位置了

translation.en: Do not let Arcannis absorb those babies' powers, or Earth is doomed.
translation.zh:
不要让阿坎尼斯吸收宝宝的能力
否则地球就完了

translation.en: Okay, we can do this.
translation.zh: 好的 我们能成功

translation.en: I played every level. I know every inch of that ship.
translation.zh: 每一级我都打过 飞船我了如指掌

translation.en: Arcannis is no match for my expert-- [spits]
translation.zh: 阿坎尼斯根本不是我的对…

translation.en: -Oh! Swallowed a bug. -[beeps]
translation.zh: 吞了一只虫

translation.en: -[Melanie] Are we gonna catch them? -Yes, we will.
translation.zh: 我们能赶上吗？ 能

translation.en: If we land on top of it, we can get inside through the engine intake ports.
translation.zh:
如果我们落在飞船顶上
就能通过引擎进气口进入

translation.en: Wait, what?
translation.zh: 等等 什么？

translation.en: -Trust me, I've done this before. -Not in real life.
translation.zh:
-相信我 我以前做过
-在真实生活中没有啊

translation.en: Get ready to jump.
translation.zh: 准备好要跳了

translation.en: I will never be ready to jump!
translation.zh: 我永远不可能准备好跳啊

translation.en: [sighs] Or we can also go in this way.
translation.zh: 或者也可以这样进去

translation.en: If Fearless isn't giving up, then neither am I.
translation.zh: 无畏不放弃 我也不会放弃

translation.en: I just need a way out.
translation.zh: 我只要找到出路就行

translation.en: [toy] Baby Bottle Bonus.
translation.zh: 宝宝奶瓶奖励

translation.en: Wherever heroes are needed.
translation.zh: 哪里需要 英雄就到哪里

translation.en: Fastest nipple in the galaxy. Take that!
translation.zh: 银河系最快奶嘴 来吧！

translation.en: Time to pick up the kids.
translation.zh: 该去接孩子们了

translation.en: Oh my God. [sighs]
translation.zh: 噢 神啊

translation.en: What? Huh? What?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: Sweet George Washington.
translation.zh: 我的天哪！

translation.en: Looks like those kids were right.
translation.zh: 看来孩子们说得没错

translation.en: -I need birds in the air now! -Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh:
-飞机立即起飞！
-是 长官

translation.en: No lobster-headed space invader gets a drop on me.
translation.zh: 决不能让龙虾头太空入侵者占了先机

translation.en: -Yes, ma'am. -If he thinks a ray gun
translation.zh:
-是 长官
-别以为有一把射线枪 穿个尖领

translation.en: and pointy collar makes him king of the moon men, well, ha.
translation.zh:
-是 长官
-别以为有一把射线枪 穿个尖领 自己就是月亮之王了

translation.en: He's never tangled with the human spirit.
translation.zh: 让他领教一下人类精神的厉害

translation.en: -Okay, I'm done. -Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh:
-好的 我说完了
-是 长官

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Connect the chairs to the machine.
translation.zh: 把椅子和机器连接起来

translation.en: The absorption chamber is ready.
translation.zh: 吸收室已经准备就绪

translation.en: Their little powers have blossomed so much.
translation.zh: 他们的小超能力发展了很多

translation.en: This will be an excellent harvest.
translation.zh: 我一定会收获满满

translation.en: The isolated gene combinations from their DNA
translation.zh: 从他们DNA中分离出的基因组合

translation.en: will be fed directly into this implant.
translation.zh: 将直接进入这个植入体

translation.en: Activate The Extrapolator. I will be in my cocoon.
translation.zh: 激活外推器 我会在我的茧里

translation.en: No, go to the Settings menu, then Preferences, then Power Level.
translation.zh:
不对 进入“设置”菜单
然后进入“偏好” 再进入“能量水平”

translation.en: Not Tools! Power Level!
translation.zh: 不是“工具” 是“能量水平”！

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I can feel it.
translation.zh: 我能感觉到

translation.en: So what's the plan?
translation.zh: 打算怎么做？

translation.en: You find the babies, I'm gonna stop this ship.
translation.zh: 你去找宝宝们 我去把飞船停下

translation.en: And how do we do that?
translation.zh: 咱们怎么能做到呢？

translation.en: Simple.
translation.zh: 很简单

translation.en: All right, so I've memorized the scheme of this place.
translation.zh: 好的 我记住了这里的位置图

translation.en: You're gonna keep going through this tunnel,
translation.zh: 你走过这条通道

translation.en: then you're gonna end up at a bunch of scary mechanical objects.
translation.zh: 然后会遇到一些可怕的机械物体

translation.en: Just gotta get through 'em.
translation.zh:
-穿过去
-听起来很危险

translation.en: -[Melanie] That sounds dangerous. -[Reid] It is. [chuckles] It is.
translation.zh:
-穿过去
-听起来很危险 是很危险

translation.en: Do not touch anything, okay?
translation.zh: 什么都不要碰 好吗？

translation.en: Go to Lab A, not Lab B,
translation.zh: 去甲实验室 不是乙试验室

translation.en: because that's the one where he's growing the monsters and mutating the animals.
translation.zh:
因为那里是培养怪物
和使动物变异的地方

translation.en: I think there's a two-headed squid in there with swords for hands.
translation.zh:
里面应该有一只双头乌贼
有刀一样的手

translation.en: -It's okay. You'll be fine. -[Melanie] I think we should switch jobs.
translation.zh: 没事 你会没事的 咱们换一下好了

translation.en: [Reid] We can't. I'm the only one who knows how to get past security lasers
translation.zh: 不行 只有我知道如何穿过安全激光

translation.en: and the security drones
translation.zh: 保安无人机

translation.en: and the security bees,
translation.zh: 还有保安蜜蜂

translation.en: which is not a technical term, they're just bees.
translation.zh:
不过这并不是专业术语
只是普通的蜜蜂罢了

translation.en: [Melanie] Are you serious?
translation.zh: 你不是吧？

translation.en: [Reid] But that's a lot of bees.
translation.zh: 不过确实是好多蜜蜂

translation.en: I'll sabotage the flight controls,
translation.zh: 我会破坏飞行控制器

translation.en: then I'll cut through the torture chamber and the racquetball court,
translation.zh: 然后穿过刑讯室和壁球室

translation.en: and I-- I don't know what else, uh...
translation.zh: 还有别的我不知道的地方

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 是吧？

translation.en: -I hate this plan. -See you in five.
translation.zh:
-我讨厌这个安排
-五分钟后见

translation.en: We're gonna laugh about this, I promise.
translation.zh: 以后咱们想起来一定会觉得好笑

translation.en: -[pilot 1] The aircraft is in sight. -[pilot 2] All right Jersey, stay focused.
translation.zh: 已经看到飞行器 好的 集中注意

translation.en: Let's keep it tight. There are civilians on board.
translation.zh: 紧跟住 飞行器上有平民

translation.en: Let's fire a warning shot.
translation.zh: 发警告弹

translation.en: [pilot 1] This is by order of the U.S. government.
translation.zh:
美国政府发出命令
你必须跟随我们前往着陆点

translation.en: You will follow us to a landing sight or be forced down.
translation.zh:
美国政府发出命令
你必须跟随我们前往着陆点 否则予以击落

translation.en: -[pilot 2] He's out of control! -[pilot 1] Break away! Break away!
translation.zh: 它失控了！ 脱离接触！

translation.en: [pilot 2] This guy's not coming down quietly. We gotta take this thing down.
translation.zh: 它不会平静地降落 得击落它

translation.en: General, we are awaiting missile authorization.
translation.zh: 将军 我们在等待导弹授权

translation.en: No, no, no, no! No! Oh, my gosh. I found you guys.
translation.zh: 不要 不要！神啊！找到你们了！

translation.en: I fear for my life, but this is way better than a game.
translation.zh: 我怕死 不过这比游戏好多了！

translation.en: All right, hands up!
translation.zh: 好的 举起手来！

translation.en: All of them...
translation.zh: 所有的手

translation.en: -[yells] -Where I can see them.
translation.zh: 让我看到

translation.en: That is all of them, right?
translation.zh: 不止这么多手 对吧？

translation.en: Land this ship, now.
translation.zh: 立刻降落飞船

translation.en: Whoa! Oh! Yeah. More of that.
translation.zh: 哇！再来

translation.en: Holy guacamole! This thing's a lot of fun.
translation.zh: 哇塞！这东西真好玩！

translation.en: You found them!
translation.zh: 你找到他们了！

translation.en: So good news, bad news: the fastest way to land this ship is to crash it.
translation.zh: 喜忧参半 降落这艘飞船的最快方式是坠毁

translation.en: We've gotta get someplace safe. Here, take them.
translation.zh: 我们得去安全的地方 给你 带上他们

translation.en: [pilot 2] Hold fire! Someone's taking it down from the inside.
translation.zh: 停止攻击！ 有人在内部试图让飞船落地

translation.en: Oh, no. No.
translation.zh: 不是吧！

translation.en: We've gotta escape. Escape in a pod of some kind, maybe--
translation.zh:
咱们得逃走
通过舱体什么的逃走

translation.en: Hang on to something!
translation.zh: 找东西抓住！

translation.en: [robot] Your pod has been deployed.
translation.zh: 舱体已经射出

translation.en: Um... thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: The power courses through my veins.
translation.zh: 力量在我的血管中流淌

translation.en: Better, stronger,
translation.zh: 更好 更强

translation.en: supercharged.
translation.zh: 超能力

translation.en: The poopy diaper just hit the fan.
translation.zh: 局势进一步恶化

translation.en: And poop just got real.
translation.zh: 情况又升级了

translation.en: Now that I've been freed from that insipid game by that foolish boy,
translation.zh:
我被那个愚蠢的男孩
从无聊的游戏中解放了出来

translation.en: I shall conquer your planet.
translation.zh: 我会征服你的星球

translation.en: You'll have to go through me first.
translation.zh: 先要问问我答不答应

translation.en: I see you brought an army. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你带来了一支军队

translation.en: So did I.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: Fire!
translation.zh: 开火！

translation.en: You are insects.
translation.zh: 你们不过是昆虫

translation.en: And you will be destroyed like insects.
translation.zh: 你们会像昆虫一样被摧毁

translation.en: Today I declare myself King of Earth.
translation.zh: 今天 我宣布自己成为地球之王

translation.en: First order of business, we are changing that name.
translation.zh: 第一项工作 改名

translation.en: Oh, this is bad. There's gotta be a way to stop him.
translation.zh: 太糟糕了 应该有办法阻止他啊

translation.en: -We've gotta get these babies to safety. -What's wrong with them?
translation.zh:
-咱们得把宝宝们送去安全的地方
-他们怎么了？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 不知道

translation.en: Ever since they were in that machine, they've been totally out of it.
translation.zh:
他们进了那机器之后
状态就完全不对

translation.en: Keep them safe. I have an idea.
translation.zh: 保护好他们 我想到了一个办法

translation.en: -[babies moaning] -Wait. Reid, are you crazy?
translation.zh: 等等 里德 你疯了吗？

translation.en: Be careful!
translation.zh: 小心一点！

translation.en: I still don't wanna die like this! No! No! No!
translation.zh: 我还不想这样就死掉！不要啊！

translation.en: What is that horrible--
translation.zh: 这是什么…

translation.en: You mock me with your vehicle of frozen confections?
translation.zh: 你用冰冻甜品车来嘲笑我？

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: Ah, the boy who's been in my way.
translation.zh: 噢 是一直在妨碍我的男孩

translation.en: You've got what you want now. We're no threat to you.
translation.zh: 你拿到了想要的东西 我们对你不构成威胁

translation.en: Just leave. Go master another planet.
translation.zh: 离开吧 去统治别的星球

translation.en: Ah. There they are.
translation.zh: 他们在这里啊

translation.en: I wondered where the little saplings had gone to.
translation.zh: 我说这些小家伙们去哪儿了

translation.en: I'm sorry, but I think it's time I end the Lightspeed lineage for good.
translation.zh: 对不起 不过应该是时候永远了结光速家族了

translation.en: I won't let you touch them!
translation.zh: 我不会让你碰他们！

translation.en: I will destroy anyone I please.
translation.zh: 我想毁灭谁就毁灭谁

translation.en: Especially those babies.
translation.zh: 尤其是这几个宝宝

translation.en: Now step aside!
translation.zh: 立刻让开！

translation.en: -Not gonna happen, green beans. -Huh?
translation.zh: 不可能的 绿豆

translation.en: I made this mess, and it's up to me to clean it up.
translation.zh:
这个麻烦是我惹的
我就得来把问题解决掉

translation.en: And if that means standing in your way, no matter what…
translation.zh: 如果这意味着要不顾一切阻挡你

translation.en: that's what I'm gonna do.
translation.zh: 我义不容辞

translation.en: Wow, that was quite a speech. What are you gonna do, gamer boy?
translation.zh:
哇 说得真好 你要怎么做 游戏男孩？
用嘴巴朝我开火？

translation.en: -Shoot me down with a speech? -[groans]
translation.zh:
你要怎么做 游戏男孩？
用嘴巴朝我开火？

translation.en: It was inspiring. [groans]
translation.zh: 非常激励人心

translation.en: I begin my reign with a show of force.
translation.zh: 我的统治 以展示力量开始

translation.en: An example to those who would dare cross me.
translation.zh:
对于胆敢对抗我的人
我要杀鸡给猴看

translation.en: Any more pathetic attempts at being a hero will be crushed.
translation.zh: 谁再想当英雄 一定会被击垮

translation.en: Crushed to dust.
translation.zh: 灰飞烟灭

translation.en: So you will learn the meaning of being fearless.
translation.zh: 这样你就会知道无畏意味着什么

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Kira!
translation.zh: 基拉！

translation.en: Ah! It's not possible!
translation.zh: 不可能！

translation.en: She's breaking through the barrier!
translation.zh: 她突破屏障了！

translation.en: Reid!
translation.zh: 里德！

translation.en: -Titus? -[in Vin Diesel's voice] Goo-goo-ga.
translation.zh: 泰特斯？

translation.en: The voice of Vin Diesel.
translation.zh: 好深沉的声音

translation.en: -High five. -High five.
translation.zh: 击掌 击掌

translation.en: They got 'em on the run people! Attack!
translation.zh: 他们被打跑了！攻击！

translation.en: You glow, girl.
translation.zh: 非常好 姑娘

translation.en: [Reid] Yeah, Kira!
translation.zh: 好 基拉！

translation.en: Wow. A natural-born gamer.
translation.zh: 哇！天生的玩家

translation.en: -[tires screeching] -Hop in. Let's do some damage.
translation.zh: 上车 咱们去大展身手

translation.en: Yeah you better run. Little toad.
translation.zh: 赶紧跑吧 小癞蛤蟆

translation.en: -[Reid yells] -[Melanie] Oh, no! Make it stop!
translation.zh: 不要啊！ 想办法停下来！

translation.en: [chuckles] She can just do everything now, can't she?
translation.zh: 她现在无所不能了 是吧？

translation.en: There's something on Arcannis's neck.
translation.zh: 阿坎尼斯脖子上有东西

translation.en: If we take that out, I think we take his power.
translation.zh:
把那东西拿下来
我想就可以让他失去力量

translation.en: -She doesn't understand. -Yes, she does.
translation.zh:
-她不明白
-不 他明白

translation.en: You've got your daddy's eyes. And they shoot lightning death blasts.
translation.zh:
你遗传了你爸的眼睛
这双眼睛能发出致命的光束

translation.en: So just remember what he taught you. You got this.
translation.zh: 记住他教你的就好 你没问题的

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不要啊！

translation.en: Yes!
