translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: Bullseye.
translation.zh: 正中靶心

translation.en: [groans] I can feel the power leaving.
translation.zh: 我能感觉到力量在消失

translation.en: You can't steal superpowers.
translation.zh: 超能力偷不走

translation.en: No! No! Noooo!
translation.zh: 不要啊！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不要啊！

translation.en: Better late than never!
translation.zh: 迟早总比不到好！

translation.en: Boy, that's a horrible catchphrase. Strike that.
translation.zh: 哎 这句话不咋样 删掉

translation.en: Captain! You're here!
translation.zh: 队长 你来了！

translation.en: You know what, frog face? You made me miss Crabfest.
translation.zh: 青蛙脸 你害我错过了螃蟹节

translation.en: I haven't missed Crabfest in seven years.
translation.zh: 我连续七年参加螃蟹节

translation.en: -So I'm not in a good mood at all. -[yells]
translation.zh: 所以我现在心情糟透了

translation.en: Hey, she's good. What game is she from?
translation.zh: 哎 她很厉害 是那个游戏的人物？

translation.en: No, she's all real.
translation.zh: 不 她是真人

translation.en: I'm here to assist, general.
translation.zh: 我来协助您 将军

translation.en: These must be your kids.
translation.zh: 他们一定是你的孩子吧

translation.en: Seems like things are… well in hand.
translation.zh: 看来情况仅在掌握中

translation.en: Where's Kira?
translation.zh: 基拉在哪里？

translation.en: She's the one without any...
translation.zh: 她没有…

translation.en: powers.
translation.zh: 超能力

translation.en: Dada!
translation.zh: 爸爸！

translation.en: Hey. You got 'em.
translation.zh: 哎 你打败了它们！

translation.en: -[Titus] Dada! -[groans]
translation.zh: 爸爸！

translation.en: -[Captain] They grow up so fast. -Hmm.
translation.zh: 他们长得好快！

translation.en: Where's the pacifier? It's time to calm them down.
translation.zh: 奶嘴在哪里？该让他们冷静下来了

translation.en: Um... no pacifiers. Does anyone have any Lionel Richie?
translation.zh:
没有奶嘴
谁有莱昂纳尔·里奇的歌吗？

translation.en: I got a Commodores album in my car.
translation.zh: 我车里有海军准将乐团唱片

translation.en: Not the same thing, private.
translation.zh: 不是一回事 二等兵

translation.en: You! Play some Lionel Richie like your life depended on it.
translation.zh:
你！来点莱昂纳尔·里奇的歌
赶紧的！

translation.en: Wouldn't be the first time.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: -We don't need an ambulance. -How about some blankets?
translation.zh:
-我们不需要救护车
-毛毯呢？

translation.en: -What for? -I don't know.
translation.zh:
-要毛毯干嘛？
-不知道

translation.en: We just always give you blankets.
translation.zh: 我们给毛毯给习惯了

translation.en: You know, this was a crazy weekend,
translation.zh: 这个周末真疯狂

translation.en: but it might've been the best one of my life.
translation.zh: 不过可能是我一辈子最棒的周末

translation.en: Really? It wasn't on your schedule.
translation.zh: 真的？并没列在你的日程表上

translation.en: I think you kinda owe me a crab dinner.
translation.zh: 我想你算是欠我一顿螃蟹餐了

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-是嘛？
-是的

translation.en: All right. [chuckles] You got it.
translation.zh: 好的 没问题

translation.en: But we still never got to that science project.
translation.zh: 但是咱们的科学项目还没做

translation.en: Hey, you two. I think you might have dropped this.
translation.zh: 哎 你们俩 你们可能掉了这个

translation.en: Or maybe we did.
translation.zh: 也许已经做了

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇！

translation.en: It is perfect. And nothing like I planned.
translation.zh: 太棒了 而且和我计划的完全不一样

translation.en: Thank you, Fearless.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 无畏

translation.en: You saved the day when I couldn't. Not everyone would've done that.
translation.zh:
我不在 幸亏有你救了大家
并不是人人都能做到

translation.en: A few days ago, I wouldn't have done that. The real world is a whole new level.
translation.zh:
几天前 我也做不到
真实世界是完全不一样的级别

translation.en: I couldn't have gotten here without help from Buckethead.
translation.zh: 没有桶头的帮助 我也来不了这里

translation.en: Wait a second. Buckethead?
translation.zh: 等等 桶头？

translation.en: Oh. You guys know each other?
translation.zh: 噢 你们认识？

translation.en: -[Buckethead] What's up, Reid? -What? How?
translation.zh: 你好 里德 啊？怎么做到的？

translation.en: [Buckethead] You know I got your back.
translation.zh: 你知道我会罩着你

translation.en: Who do you think got him his Baby Bottle Bonus?
translation.zh: 宝宝奶瓶奖励是谁给他的？

translation.en: I guess we've finished the final level together, Elliot.
translation.zh:
看来咱们一起完成了最后一级
埃利奥特

translation.en: [Buckethead] We sure did. We did it together.
translation.zh: 没错 咱们一起完成的

translation.en: Fearless and the Finisher.
translation.zh: 无畏和终结者

translation.en: Bye, Xander.
translation.zh: 再见 赞德

translation.en: -Think happy thoughts. -[giggles]
translation.zh: 开心一点

translation.en: Titus. One for the road?
translation.zh: 泰特斯 击掌上路？

translation.en: -And you. -[gasps]
translation.zh: 还有你

translation.en: -Hmm. -I'll miss you.
translation.zh: 我会想你的

translation.en: Hang on to that, you two, in case we need you again.
translation.zh:
这东西你们俩拿好吧
万一我们还要找你们

translation.en: -Where you headed next? -Wherever heroes are needed.
translation.zh: 下一个地方去哪里？ 哪里需要 英雄就到哪里

translation.en: Can you believe we got an A+ on our science project?
translation.zh: 咱们科学项目居然拿到了优+

translation.en: That's a relief.
translation.zh: 总算松了口气

translation.en: Otherwise my parents never would've forgiven me for trashing the house.
translation.zh: 否则我父母绝不会原谅我把家里弄烂

translation.en: -And we finally got our date. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 而且咱们终于约会了

translation.en: We really bent the laws of reality this weekend.
translation.zh: 这个周末咱们真的弯曲了现实法则

translation.en: What if we're just characters in someone else's game?
translation.zh: 如果咱们只是别人游戏中的角色呢？

translation.en: I hardly know what's real anymore.
translation.zh: 我都不知道什么是真实的了

translation.en: This? This is real enough for me.
translation.zh: 这对我来说够真实了

translation.en: Game on, Fearless!
translation.zh: 游戏开始 无畏

translation.en: Looks like we're taking it to the next level.
translation.zh: 看来咱们进入下一级了

translation.en: [baby giggles] Bye-bye.
translation.zh: 再见 字幕翻译：朱音
